review_data.title: Was amazing
review_data.content: End to end it was amazing. The taste of the food, service quality, and the atmosphere were great. We tried the fish menu, I could say that portions were so big that we couldn't finish.

review_data.title: Disappointing
review_data.content: way too expensive for what you get! even though there's like 6 waiters and waitresses, it takes forever until one notices you. the terrace is beautiful so we decided to go have a drink and maybe something to eat one day. waitress took our order...More

review_data.title: Now this is what Mediterranean Culture and Restaurant is Like!
review_data.content: Warm, welcoming, sensational food, heavenly service, beautiful classy environment and ambience great for engagements, weddings or any other special occasions

review_data.title: Mediterranean holidays feeling
review_data.content: Secret gem, outstanding quality of food and service. Tip: fish that is super fresh. Personal touch and unique attention to details

review_data.title: Das Gesamtpaket stimmt!
review_data.content: Köstliches Essen, hervorragende Stimmung, toller Gastgeber. Und am Schluss tanzten die Gäste Sirtaki!

review_data.title: Ausgezeichnete Küche, sehr freundlicher Service

review_data.title: Amazing food, environment and service!
review_data.content: Fresh fish , a lot of delicious, and healthy mediteranian recipes! Highly recommended for great Greek cuisine!
